title: Handle a VTS System Failure
description: The primary radar for the Vessel Traffic Service (VTS) fails. The operator must switch to backup procedures.

tasks.description: Recognize the radar system has failed and is not displaying vessel positions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator sees the system alert for 'Radar Failure'.

tasks.description: Switch to using the backup system (e.g., AIS data only) and report the failure to the technical department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator switches to the backup view and logs a high-priority IT ticket.

tasks.description: Broadcast a notice to all mariners via VHF radio informing them of the reduced VTS capability.
tasks.expected_outcome: A 'securité' message is broadcast to all vessels in the area, advising them to navigate with extra caution.
